summary: The self-driving car is traveling on a straight road with light traffic. From 0.0s to 6.0s, the car is driving at a constant speed. From 6.0s to 9.0s, a person is walking on the right side of the road behind a wall. From 9.0s to 11.0s, a man on a motorcycle appears from behind the wall on the right side of the road. From 11.0s to 17.0s, a white van is driving in the opposite direction. From 17.0s to 22.4s, there is debris on the road.
characters: From 6.0s to 9.0s, a person is walking on the right side of the road behind a wall.
From 9.0s to 11.0s, a man on a motorcycle appears from behind the wall on the right side of the road.
From 11.0s to 17.0s, a white van is driving in the opposite direction.
key_objects: Right side: A man on a motorcycle, approximately 10 meters away, emerges from behind a wall, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate or stop.
Center: Debris on the road, approximately 5 meters away, potentially causing the vehicle to change lanes or decelerate.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight on a road with light traffic. The speed appears constant from 0.0s to 6.0s. The vehicle maintains its speed and direction to follow the road.
